name: Robot Pirates
storyline: You are a robot pirate, sail the sea, jump the ships and collect as much booty as you can in this fun, frantic & formidable platformer! With randomly generated ships and endless challenges, this is a great time-killing game to test your platforming skills. Remember, even though you're a pirate and you know how to work it, you can't touch the water as it makes you short circuit! Stay alive by avoiding the enemies, the water and the ever-getting-faster tidal wave behind you!
